description:
At Montagna Klein Camden L.L.P., in Newport News, Virginia, we are serious about fighting for our clients. With our "no boundary" approach to every case we take on, you are assured of getting the representation you deserve. In personal injury cases, we get you compensation from everyone responsible for your injury. When we defend you on criminal charges, we are aggressive and thorough. If we are representing you in a family law dispute, we guard your position with vigor.

Our attorneys have a genuine commitment to each client. We treat you as an individual. We take the time to:

  • Understand your personal circumstances
  • Ascertain how the accident has affected 
  • Establish the precise nature of your injuries

Some law firms fail to do this because they treat clients as a number. Their clients lose out because insurers in personal injury cases, prosecutors in criminal trials and family lawyers in contested divorces don't take them seriously. Don't let this happen to you.

From maritime and construction accidents to injuries sustained on the road or at work, there are few personal injury scenarios our law firm has not successfully dealt with. 

Over the years we have helped countless people deal with the trauma of criminal charges, including DUI, reckless driving and other serious criminal offenses such as murder and drug distribution. 

Our family lawyers are dedicated to giving you the supportive guidance you need when your marriage has come to an end and disputes relating to alimony, child support and custody arise.

It's in your interests to contact us. Our lawyers will schedule a free consultation and put together the best strategy possible. We represent people throughout Virginia and overseas and have offices in Norfolk and Newport News. We also have a large practice in the Virginia Beach area. We accept credit cards.
